alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 9:04AM CDT until April 09 at 4:08PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Mermentau River Near Mermentau Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding begins along the bayou with a few structures right along the bayou threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CDT Sunday was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 4.6 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Bayou Des Cannes Eunice 16.0 16.5 Sun 8 am CDT 9.9 5.5 5.1 &&
